description:
Find Anyone Online with Ease – The Ultimate AI Powered People Search & Social Media Lookup App!

Ever wondered where to find social profiles of someone you just met? Looking to reconnect with an old friend or check out a new acquaintance's social media presence? Our powerful DeepSearch AI Search Assistant app helps you discover publicly available information about individuals effortlessly – all in one place!

With just a name, our AI Search Assistant scans multiple platforms, letting you find people online quickly and conveniently. No more endless searching across multiple websites—our social media profile discovery tool consolidates everything in a single, easy-to-use interface.


• Why Choose Our People Search & Social Media Lookup App?
- Find Social Profiles Easily – Search by name, phone number, email, or username to locate social media accounts across various platforms.
- Comprehensive Background Search – Access publicly available records, images, videos, and other relevant information about people.
- Find Friends Online – Reconnect with lost contacts, old classmates, or former colleagues in just a few taps.
- Social Media Discovery – Get insights into someone’s online presence, including publicly available professional and personal information.
- Stay Informed – Instantly see what’s trending and discover who’s being searched the most.
- Quick & Simple Searches – Our intuitive interface makes finding people online fast, efficient, and hassle-free.


• Powerful Features at Your Fingertips!
- Advanced Social Media Finder: Locate someone’s social accounts, including any social media accounts.
- Cross-Platform Search – Save time by searching multiple sources at once instead of manually browsing different websites.
- Publicly Available Background Info – See professional details, online mentions, and other insights about individuals.
- Find PPL Online in Just Seconds – Enter a name or username, and we’ll handle the rest.
- Search History & Popular Searches – Keep track of your previous searches and explore the most searched individuals.
- Privacy & Transparency – We only provide publicly accessible information, ensuring ethical and responsible use.


•Who Can Benefit from This App?
- Networking Enthusiasts: Whether you're at a business event or meeting someone new, find their online profiles instantly.
- Recruiters & Employers: Look up professional backgrounds to make informed hiring decisions.
- Journalists & Researchers: Gather publicly available data for articles, reports, and investigations.
- Curious Individuals: Learn more about friends, colleagues, or even public figures without the hassle of searching manually.
- Online Daters: Verify someone’s online and publicly available presence before taking the next step.


No more guesswork or endless web searches! Whether you're trying to find social profiles, reconnect with a friend, or conduct a background search, our app delivers fast and accurate results using publicly available data.


UNLIMITED ACCESS TO ALL FEATURES
- You can subscribe for unlimited access to all app’s features.
- Subscriptions are billed automatically at the rate depending on the selected subscription plan.

By using the app, you confirm that you acknowledge and accept our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service:
Privacy Policy: https://deepsearchai.app/privacy
Terms of Use:  https://deepsearchai.app/terms

استمتع الآن بتجربة جديدة كليًا من شكرًا!

قمنا بتغيير كامل لتصميم التطبيق الخاص بنا مع واجهة مستخدم جديدة أبسط وأكثر حداثة وملاءمة من أي وقت مضى.

أكثر بساطة

* تصفح بسرعة ويسر مع قائمة شريط تبويب سهلة الاستخدام
* استمتع بعروض وخصومات وفاعليات في المتاجر الأقرب إليك
* احسب بسهولة نقاط شكرنز التي يمكن أن تكسبها أو تنفقها في العلامات التجارية المفضلة لك في كل الأوقات حتى أثناء فترات التخفيضات.

مزيد من الأمان

* Face ID أو Touch ID  قم بتسجيل الدخول بسهولة وأمان مع ميزة 
* استمتع بمزيد من الأمان الرقمي مع تكنولوجيا ضد الاحتيال

فائدة أكبر بكثير

* استقبل قسائم خصم وعروضًا حصرية مباشرة على شاشة هاتفك الرئيسية
* لمزيد من الراحة Apple Wallet أضف بطاقة شكرًا الخاصة بك إلى
* اطّلع على إيصالاتك ومعاملاتك بكل سهولة
* استخدم صندوق بريد الوارد لإرسال ملاحظاتك إلى شكرًا على الفور ولتلقي عروض رائعة 
* تحكم في خياراتك المفضلة للتواصل معك عبر الإيميل والرسائل النصية والإشعارات في لحظات من خلال ميزة "حسابي" الخاص بك

MATCH, CHAT & DATE. IT STARTS WITH A SWIPE™.
With 97+ billion matches to date, Tinder® is the top free dating app and the best place to meet new people, with safety features that work to help you date more safely. Looking for love? An open relationship? Trying to find a date or new friends to chat with? Connect with local people everywhere on Tinder and get the best out of your dating experience:

Come As You Are: whether you're straight, gay, bisexual or anything in between, you can be who you are and find who you want on Tinder.
Date Beyond Photos: share your interests and learn more about your matches to get the conversation started.
Seek What You’re Looking For: set your relationship goals and make connections on your terms.

HOW TINDER WORKS
It’s easy and fun to find new people on Tinder®. Express yourself to make your personality shine in your profile and stand out to potential matches. Answer a prompt, share a little about you and show your face in your pics to increase your match-making potential. Use the Swipe Right™ feature to like and the Swipe Left™ feature to nope. If they like you back, It’s a Match! And with our double opt-in feature, it’s only a match if the interest is mutual.

PUT SAFETY FIRST
Try some of our safety features to help you make connections more confidently:

– Share My Date: share date plans with friends and fam, so they know who you’re planning to meet up with and where
– Get Photo Verified: verify your photos to help potential matches know it’s really you in that cute pic & increase your chances of matching
– Are You Sure / Does This Bother You: Tinder detects inappropriate language so people think twice before sending a disrespectful message
– Report a Profile: quickly report and block profiles with suspicious activity or inappropriate behaviour
– Block Contacts: take control and block anyone (like an ex) you don’t want to see on the app
– Video Chat: hitting it off in chat? Test your online dating chemistry and meet new people from home!

TRY TINDER PLUS
– Unlimited likes for you to catch feelings for as many new people as you want
– Use Passport Mode™ to match and chat with locals anywhere in the world before you arrive
– Unlimited Rewinds to undo your last like or nope
– Go Incognito and be seen only by the people you like

EXPERIENCE TINDER GOLD
– Get everything in Tinder Plus™, and try it out for a week before you commit to a monthly subscription
– See who likes you and match with them on the spot for faster connections
– Monthly Boost puts your profile to the top for 30 minutes to help increase your profile views
– Weekly Super Likes, because sometimes you really, really like someone

UPGRADE TO TINDER PLATINUM
Get most of Tinder’s premium features: join Tinder Platinum™ to get your likes prioritised with potential matches, send them a compliment before matching and more.

So what are you waiting for? Join millions of people worldwide! Tinder offers the most daters, increasing your chances of finding exactly what you're looking for. Download the best free dating app today!

––––––––––––––––––––
If you choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, you can simply continue using Tinder for free.

All photos are of models and used for illustrative purposes only.

Privacy: https://www.gotinder.com/privacy
Terms: https://www.gotinder.com/terms

Floward is the #1 gift & flower shop with 100% fresh flowers guaranteed. Order online, for same-day gift & flower delivery to Nationwide. With Floward, sending flowers and gifts is as enjoyable as receiving them! Share the love and love yourself.

     - DIY Box: Floral arrangement is a therapeutic art practise, get creative and take time for yourself.
     - Variety of Flower Arrangements and Online Gifts including chocolate, teddy bears, cakes, balloons, plants, and much more.
     - Easy Payments: we accept international credit and debit cards.


Order flowers online and get them delivered to your loved ones anywhere in Nationwide.


Shop gifts and flowers for any occasion, such as Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Anniversary, Birthday, Sympathy, Get well, Thank you or surprise a person you love or reconnect with your friends and family.

Are you looking for cake delivery, balloon delivery, chocolate delivery, cheap gifts, a plant shop, rose arrangements, or fresh flowers? Floward UK is the best choice to buy and send gifts – an online flower shop that will amaze you!


Buy a gift and send flowers online with Floward and choose us as your main gift company and your constant online flower delivery shop for all future occasions!


Download our gifts & flowers shop app, make an order, and get it delivered the same day! Buy a flower, send a gift - Enjoy arrangements made by our florists!

All-in-one Insurance Hub: Car & Travel Insurance in Qatar
QIC App is your complete Insurance Hub for managing car and travel insurance in Qatar. Access everything you need — from instant policy purchase to real-time claims and lifestyle services — all in one secure app.

Core Features:
— Buy and renew car insurance (TPL and Comprehensive) instantly
— Purchase and view your travel insurance policies anytime
— Store, manage, and track all policies in your in-app wallet
— Submit claims and follow their status in real-time
— Roadside assistance and emergency help with SOS button
— View your vehicle’s service history from partner garages
— 24/7 in-app support and secure payments
— Available in Qatar, UAE, Oman, and other supported regions

New: Explore the QIC Market
Welcome to the QIC Market — your new destination for buying and listing vehicles.
Browse new and used cars from verified dealers or list your own car for others to discover — all directly through QIC App.

New: Earn Rewards with QIC Coins
Get rewarded for every action!
Earn QIC Coins when you buy insurance or use services, and redeem them for exclusive gifts and offers inside the app.

More Than Just Insurance
— Book car services like washing, maintenance, and detailing
— Get instant quotes and appointments from trusted garages
— Buy or lease a car with support from QIC’s verified network
— Discover tailored offers for auto, home, and lifestyle needs
— Manage all your needs in one secure, seamless app

Active users will find their car insurance policies automatically synced at login. New users can get insured in under 2 minutes — and start collecting QIC Coins from day one.

With QIC App, insurance is just the beginning. From car and travel coverage to rewards and vehicle listings, it’s your complete companion for everyday convenience in Qatar and beyond.

Download QIC App today — your all-in-one Insurance Hub for car, travel, rewards, and more.

QatarPrayer is an application to show prayer times in Qatar.
This application was designed due to the inaccuracy of Qatar prayer times in most of the applications and websites. All prayer times have been carefully checked and written based on QatarCH.

#Features:
- Qatar Prayer Times based on Qatar Calendar House.
- Islamic Calendar with prayer times.
- Mosque search feature.
- Push notifications and ability to choose Athan as a tone. (Required Internet connection)
- Quran Radio. (Required Internet connection)
- Qibla direction works worldwide.
- Today Widget with timer.
- iOS 14 Widgets (Home Screen).
- Support Apple Watch.
- iOS 16 Widgets (Lock Screen).

قطر برير عبارة عن برنامج لعرض أوقات الصلاة في دولة قطر
تم تصميم هذا البرنامج نظراً لإختلاف وعدم دقة المواقيت في أغلب البرامج والمواقع الإلكترونية، علماً بأن جميع الأوقات تم التأكد منها وكتابتها بعناية تامة، بالاعتماد على دار التقويم القطري.

#المميزات:
- عرض أوقات الصلاة في دولة قطر بالإعتماد على دار التقويم القطري.
- تقويم هجري مع عرض لأوقات الصلاة.
-  خاصية البحث عن المساجد.
- خدمة التنبيه لكل صلاة وإمكانية اختيار الأذان كصوت للنغمة. (يحتاج الإتصال بالإنترنت)
- إذاعة القرآن الكريم. (يحتاج الإتصال بالإنترنت)
- اتجاه القبلة وتعمل في جميع أنحاء العالم.
- عداد تنازلي لأوقات الصلاة في الموجز اليومي.
- دعم إضافة خاصية الأدوات (Widgets) في الشاشة الرئيسية.
- دعم ساعة ابل.
- دعم إضافة خاصية الأدوات (Widgets) في شاشة القفل.

【Mi Cloud Storage Automatic Renewal Service Description 】
- Renewal Service:7-day overwriting Renewal storage plan,30-day overwriting Renewal storage plan
- Renewal period:one month
- Renewal price: 7-day overwriting Renewal storage plan for 10 yuan/month, 30-day overwriting Renewal storage plan for 24 yuan/month
- Payment: after confirming the subscription, your Apple ID account will be debited;
- Cancel renewal:If you cancel the renewal, please manually turn off the automatic renewal function in the iTunes/AppleID settings management 24 hours before the current subscription period expires. Specific path:Please open the Apple mobile phone"settings"-->enter"iTunes store and AppStore"-->click"Apple ID",select"View Apple ID",enter the "Account Settings"page,click"subscribe",select Mi Cloud Storage unsubscribe. If you cancel within 24 hours before the expiration, the subscription fee will be charged;
- Renewal: Apple ID account will be deducted within 24 hours before expiration. After the deduction is successful, the subscription period will be extended by one subscription period;
- Mi Cloud Storage Automatic Renewal Service Agreement: https://camera.api.io.mi.com/cloud-service/app/doc/auto_renew-en.html，
- Mi Cloud Storage User Agreement: https://camera.api.io.mi.com/cloud-service/app/doc/user_licence-en.html
- About Cloud Storage Automatic Renewal: https://camera.api.io.mi.com/cloud-service/app/my_cloud.html?channel=iosinfo&locale=en#/renew
- Terms of Use and User Agreement: https://g.home.mi.com/views/user-terms.html?locale=en&type=userLicense
- Privacy Policy: https://g.home.mi.com/views/user-terms.html?locale=en&type=userPrivacy

【HealthKit】
- Your record after each weighing: BMI (body mass index), body fat percentage, weight, lean body mass will be shared to Apple Health.

Whether you want to get yourself a new car, move into a new place, furnish and decorate it, or even find a new job, Qatar Living has got you covered. From premium choices to affordable options, our app has something for everyone.

إذا اشتركت في أحد الباقات المميزة فسوف يتم احتساب القيمة على حسابك في iTunes، وسوف يتم تجديد الاشتراك خلال الـ ٢٤ ساعة السابقة لنهايته. يمكنك إلغاء الاشتراك في أي وقت عن طريق الذهاب إلى الإعدادات الموجودة في iTunes. لمزيد من المعلومات، نرجو منك زيارة صفحة الخصوصية وشروط الاستخدام : https://fdfd.me/privacypolicy

Discover a world of unbeatable savings with the ENTERTAINER. Say farewell to paying in full and unlock buy one get one free offers at the best restaurants, bars, attractions, leisure activities, spas, salons, retail, services, hotel stays and more - across your country.

We offer an annual membership in the following countries – the UAE, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Oman, Kuwait and Singapore – plus a GCC product that covers the whole region.

How it works

• Our offers are always buy one get one free – for example in a casual dining restaurant you can buy one Main Course and get a second Main Course for free.

• You get three core offers per merchant – plus non-depleting Monthly Bonus Offers.

• All offers can be used 7 days a week – minimal exclusion days apply.

• A maximum of 4 Buy One Get One Free Offers can be redeemed at one time for a group of 8 people or more.

Here’s why you’ll love the ENTERTAINER

• Always Buy One Get One Free - our core value proposition is the best value offer in the market – allowing our Members access to substantial savings on dining, entertainment, wellness and more – every single day.

• Monthly offers – from brunches to pamper packages – these bonus offers are available exclusively to ENTERTAINER members.

• Share the experiences and the savings – you can share your app with up to 3 family members.

• Easily find the offers you want – location-based search by category, area, cuisine and more.

• Track how much you save – with opportunities to save everyday, it really does add up and our savings calculator will show you how much you and your family save in a year.


The ENTERTAINER helps you save many, discover new experiences and enhances your everyday lifestyle.


Download the app today and join our family of over 4 million happy savers across and get ready for a thrilling year of savings!


If you’re a first-time user and you’re not sure what to go for, you can sign up to our 30 Day Free Trial, which gives you the opportunity to try 2 offers from a selection of merchants. Got a question? Get in touch at customerservice@theentertainerme.com – we’d love to help you.

The dating app bringing people closer to love

Bumble is the dating app where people meet, make connections, and start their love stories. We believe meaningful relationships are the foundation of a happy, healthy life — and we're here to help you find yours with a commitment to member safety and tools that empower confident dating.

Match with the right people, date, and find meaningful connection

Bumble is a free app for meeting singles and building connections grounded in mutual respect and trust. Whether you’re ready to find the one or date for fun, Bumble can help you connect with real people to build something authentic.

As champions of love, we prioritize creating a space where our members feel respected, confident, and empowered to make connections

- Our members are at the heart of everything we do
- We put safety first — so you can date with confidence, knowing you’re connecting with verified matches
- Respect, courage, and joy guide how we show up — and inspire others to do the same

Try our free features — built to make dating easier
- For better connections, conversations, and dates, personalize your profile with interests and prompts to showcase who you are, what you’re into, and what you’re looking for
- Trust that the person you’re talking to is real with ID Verification
- Feel confident with expert-backed dating advice designed to help you succeed
- See what music you bond over by linking your Spotify account
- Video chat and share your favorite pictures with your matches to get to know them better
- Chat with peace of mind — knowing that when you’re talking to new people, all messages must meet our community guidelines
- Get extra reassurance by sharing the details of your meetups with someone you trust
- If you’re ever in need of a dating break, hide your profile with the Snooze Mode (you'll still keep all your matches)

Want even more ways to connect? Bumble Premium unlocks extra features to boost your dating experience
- See everyone who likes you
- Use Advanced Filters like “What are they looking for?” to meet people who share your values, hobbies, and goals

AlMosaly is the largest Islamic app, your companion in your day, with + 40 M Muslims worldwide, with new services and surprises. 
enjoy Azan and prayer times with complete accuracy according to your country and city, in addition to many features, such as (complete supplications, the Qur’an with the Khatmah, supplications, supplications, Qiblah, rosary, legal ruqyah, accounting verses, your obediences, and more) with everything you need in your daily and devotional life, it is the best companion for you in your life.

BENEFITS OF AlMosaly FOR MUSLIMS:

- Salah Times: The app provides location-based Islamic prayer times and pre-Azan notifications, enabling users to pray with precision and timeliness.
- Azan: The app features azan pray times, providing audible reminders for prayer times.
- Nearby Mosques: The app locates mosques in the vicinity, saving users the effort of searching for them during prayer times. 
- Qibla Finder: In 5 accurate ways, it features an electronic compass that accurately indicates the qibla direction with a clear illustration.
- The Holy Quran: Users have access to the Holy Quran, complete with translations in various recitations.
- Azkar: The app includes morning and evening remembrances (Morning Athkar and Evening Athkar), along with personalized Azkar notifications throughout the day.
- Dua: It offers Muslim supplications from the Quran and the Quran and Prophet's Sunnah
- Tasbih: Users can utilize an electronic Tasbih during waiting times or at other suitable moments.
- The Hijri Calendar: This feature includes important Islamic dates, such as Ramadan 2025.
- Multi-Language Support: AlMosaly provides content in more than one language to cater to Muslims around the globe.

With a simple, user-friendly interface and customization options, the app allows modifications in the calculation of prayer times based on different sects
Designed for Muslims worldwide, AlMosaly app serves as an essential companion in their daily lives, enhancing their faith through intelligent reminders and reliable resources. It is an indispensable application for Muslim smartphones.




“Download the AlMosaly app now and maintain a lifelong connection to your Islamic practices.”

Connect your IoT home appliances to the LG ThinQ app.
Enjoy effortless product control, smart care, and convenient automation in one simple solution.

■ Discover the convenience of smart home appliances through the Home tab.
 - Control your IoT home appliances from anywhere with our app.
 - Get personalized recommendations for managing appliances based on usage history.
 - Find out ways to better make use of the app's features from "Explore"
■ Upgrade your products from ThinQ Play.
 - Use your products more efficiently and with greater ease by introducing new features to products you are currently using.
 - Upgrade your products based on your lifestyle and personal preferences.
■ Monitor your energy consumption data quickly.
 - Use Energy Monitoring to compare your power usage with your neighbors’.
 - Set energy saving goals and get usage status notifications to help save energy more efficiently.
 - Receive care services for your products all in one place.
■ Handle everything from troubleshooting to service requests directly from the app.
 - Use the Smart Diagnosis function to check your product’s status.
 - Book a service visit from a professional engineer for an accurate diagnosis and inspection.
■ Conveniently reference LG home appliance manuals in one place.
 - Access a range of content, including function descriptions and essential usage solutions for products.

※ Services and features may vary depending on your product model and your country or region of residence.

The following access permissions are necessary for the ThinQ app. 
All the access permissions requested are optional access permission, so even if you do not allow them, you can still use the app except for the related services. (Including OS Request Permissions such as "Siri & Search", "Notification", "Background App Refresh", and "Cellular Data")

[Optional Access Permissions]
• Location
- To find and connect to nearby Wi-Fi when registering the product.
- To set and save the home location in Manage Home
- To search for and use information about current locations, such as weather.
- To check your current location in the "Smart Routines" function.

• Camera
- To take a profile picture
- To share a home or account scanned from a QR code.
- To take and attach photos in "1:1 Inquiry."
- To record and store purchase receipts when registering additional information about the product..(미국 Only)
- To use the AI oven Cooking Record feature.
- To use in “Chat with LG” when entering the product and serial number information 

• Photo, Media, File
- To use the smartphone's storage when downloading the information of the product to be connected
- To take and attach photos in "1:1 Inquiry."
- To record and store purchase receipts when registering additional information about the product.
- To view photo/video on your smartphone on the TV.
- To use in “Chat with LG” to save photos/videos of product symptoms or proof of purchase
- To use in “Chat with LG” when entering the product and serial number information

• Media and Apple Music
- To view photo/video on your smartphone on the TV.

• Microphone
- To check product status via Smart Diagnosis
- To use in “Chat with LG” when inputting through the microphone in the input window and using STT.

• Local Network
- To obtain the device connecting Wi-Fi info when adding devices

• Bluetooth
- To find and connect to nearby Bluetooth devices when adding a product to the app.

• HomeKit
- To add IoT-based products

• Notifications
- Notifications are essential for receiving updates on product status, important notices, benefits, and information.

Kidslox parental control app is the perfect way to manage your family’s screen time. Our parental controls let you block apps, block internet access, and filter web content with ease.

Kidslox gives you control over your family’s device usage. Filter web content, block apps or websites, set weekly schedules with screen time limits, and see what your kids do with their devices, all from one place.

Kidslox new Screen Time Rewards feature encourages your kids to do their homework and household chores! 

As the first multi-platform parental controls, Kidslox gives you remote control over iPhones from other devices or vice-versa.

One account is all you need to manage your family’s screen time. Add up to 10 iPhones, iPads, iPods and other mobile devices and control your devices using the Kidslox app or any desktop or mobile web browser.

The Kidslox location tracker helps you keep your family safe offline as well as online. 

Prioritize your family time now by taking a moment to place daily limits on your child’s screen time. Parental control has never been so easy.

Kidslox features:

Screen Time Controls
• Set daily screen time limits
• Give screen time rewards for completed chores
• Use Schedules for device free homework time, dinnertime, bedtime and family time

Family Location Tracker
• See the location of your kids’ devices on the map
• Get notifications when your kids leave or arrive at preset zones

Parental Controls
• See what your child's been doing on their device
• Switch between different restriction levels at the touch of a button
• Stop your clever kids from changing the restrictions with a unique Kidslox PIN

Content Blocker
• Disable disruptive apps individually
• Filter pornography, gambling, violence and other adult content to give your child a safe browser experience
• Block internet access completely for added safety 
• Block in-app purchases
• Block Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat and other social networks
• Block games like Minecraft, Clash of Clans and Pokémon Go

Cross-Platform Coverage
• Keep your child or teen safe across devices
• Add up to 10 devices
• Manage all devices from one app or web browser

EXPERTS LOVE KIDSLOX

Recommended by ITV This Morning Parenting Expert Sue Atkins, Sarah Ockwell-Smith, Mother of four, Parenting Expert and bestselling author of six parenting books and Amber Mac, Canadian TV personality and technology commentator.

To use Kidslox you will need to download the app onto each device you wish to control. One paid account allows you to control up to 10 devices.

Kidslox contains no advertisements.

Kidslox parental control app offers a 3-day free trial of all Premium features. When the trial is over, access to features requires a subscription, with discounts for longer commitments.

Subscription and payment are made via your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Otherwise, the account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Cancellation of the current subscription is not allowed during the active subscription period. 'Lifetime subscription' does not auto-renew but gives ongoing access to Premium features for a one-off payment.

Help and Support:
Once you have downloaded Kidslox you will find all the help and online support you need from inside the app under our Help section.

Find copies of our terms and conditions using the link below: https://kidslox.com/terms/ and privacy policy here: https://kidslox.com/privacy-policy/

Kidslox requires an internet connection to operate

If a device has already been set up with an education or business MDM profile (Mobile Device Management) then you will not be able to add Kidslox unless you remove the original profile.

Muslim: Quran, Athan & Qibla is your comprehensive Islamic companion, designed to support your daily spiritual journey. With essential features like accurate prayer time reminders, Azkar collection, and Qibla direction, it helps strengthen your faith and manage your daily worship seamlessly.

Key Features:

* Accurate Prayer Times: Never miss a prayer again! Get precise notifications for all Salah times (Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, Isha) based on your location.
* Azkar & Duas: Immerse yourself in spiritual invocations with a curated collection of Azkar and Duas, perfect for morning, evening, and every moment in between. Strengthen your connection with Allah through heartfelt invocations.
* Tasbih Counter: Elevate your Dhikr practice with the built-in Tasbih Counter. This feature includes an electronic tasbih and prayer bead counter to help you track your count while reciting your prayer or Dua.
* Qibla Direction: Find the Qibla direction accurately, no matter where you are. The integrated Qibla compass ensures precise alignment for your prayers.
* Quran Access: Read and reflect on the Holy Quran directly within the app. The clear and user-friendly interface allows for easy navigation between chapters and verses, supporting your daily recitation goals.
* Prayer Reminders: Never miss a prayer with customizable reminders that fit your routine. Whether it's a gentle nudge for Fajr or a midday reminder for Dhuhr, you'll stay connected to your worship schedule.

Muslim: Quran, Athan & Qibla is designed to be your trusted spiritual companion, integrating faith seamlessly into your daily routine. Whether you're managing prayer times, reflecting on Quranic verses, or seeking solace in Azkar and Duas, this app supports your spiritual growth and devotion.

Download now and experience the convenience, guidance, and fulfillment of having a complete Islamic companion right at your fingertips. Stay connected to your faith, no matter where life takes you.
